GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

DELETE/api/comments/:comment_id.description: returns 204 no content after successful deletion

GET/api/articles/:article_id.description: returns article object with correct properties

GET/api/users.description: returns an array of all users

GET/api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of all comments for a given article id

POST/api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with the posted comment when given correct input

PATCH/api/articles/:article_id.description: returns the updated object when given correct input
